name: Royale Heroes Online
description: Royale Heroes is an Android-based RTS (Real-Time Strategy) game inspired by all tribes' resistance in the archipelago against colonialists in ancient times. From time to time, various Indonesian hero characters are presented in this game to help players win war after war to free the archipelago from invaders. This game offers epic battles with many troops and a variety of unique skills from each hero made based on the history of each hero.
